title: Collaborative Computer-Supported Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic e-learning design experience and practical experience in language education fields
context.additional_context: Collaboration tool-based project execution linked to real job tasks, utilizing smartphone-centric platforms.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design language education scenarios using ILDE (Integrated Learning Design Environment) key features
Learners can produce three or more computer-assisted learning materials optimized for mobile environments
Learners can verify the effectiveness of designed learning activities through peer assessment and feedback processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
